code.title: Code
code.description: Identifier assigned by the customer or buyer for internal routing purposes.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description:
Any additional Codes, IDs, SKUs, or other regional or custom
identifiers that may be used to identify the order.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Buyer accounting reference cost code associated with the document.

period.title: Period
period.description:
Period of time that the invoice document refers to often used in addition to the details
provided in the individual line items.

buyer.title: Buyer
buyer.description: Party who is responsible for issuing payment, if not the same as the customer.

seller.title: Seller
seller.description: Seller is the party liable to pay taxes on the transaction if not the same as the supplier.

purchases.title: Purchase Orders
purchases.description: Purchase orders issued by the customer or buyer.

sales.title: Sales Orders
sales.description: Sales orders issued by the supplier or seller.

tender.title: Tender Advice
tender.description: Tender advice, the identification of the call for tender or lot the invoice relates to.

Ordering.description: Ordering provides additional information about the ordering process including references to other documents and alternative parties involved in the order-to-delivery process.
